page.title: List of heads of government of Russia

revisions.rev:
This is a list of '''Heads of Government of Russia''' or '''[[Prime Minister of Russia|Prime Ministers of Russia]]''' (in the modern sense), and its since 1905 as the [[Russian Empire]], from when the first Prime Minister, [[Sergei Witte]], took office in 1905, until the present day. The office is currently held by [[Vladimir Putin]]. Multiple government change in office, consecutive or otherwise, are listed and counted in the first column (''total number'') and the second column (''administration number''). ==Russian Empire== {| class="wikitable" |- | align=center | '''T#''' | align=center | '''A#''' | align=center | '''Name''' | align=center | '''Photo''' | align=center | '''Took Office''' | align=center | '''Left Office''' | style="text-align:center; width:15%;"| '''Political Party''' | align=center | '''[[Head of state]]''' |- !colspan="8"|Chairmen of Council of Ministers of the [[Russian Empire]] (1905-1917) |- | style="text-align:center;" colspan="2"|'''1''' | align=center | [[Count]] [[Sergei Witte]] | align=center | [[File:Sergius Witte Portrait by Ilya Repin.jpeg|100px]] | align=center | 6 November 1905 | align=center | 5 May 1906 | align=center | None | align=center | [[Nicholas II of Russia|Nicholas II]] |- | style="text-align:center;" colspan="2"|'''2''' | align=center | [[Ivan Goremykin]]
